text: Warwick Estevam Kerr (born September 9, 1922, Santana do Parnaíba, São Paulo, Brazil- 15 September 2018) is a Brazilian engineer, geneticist, entomologist, and professor. He made many discoveries in the genetics and sex determination of bees. He is also responsible for the spread of africanized bees across the world. == Other websites == *Warwick Estevam Kerr Biography . Brazilian Academy of Sciences. title: Warwick Estevam Kerr
